name: Coding
description: Achieve whatever goals you have with my several years of Front-End experience and variety of skills
highlights: Work on a single project or MVP
Add me to your team for bigger projects and long term work
Maintain and upgrade tools and make enhancements for your existing application
Migrate your project to React or GatsbyJS

name: Mentoring
alt: Student talking with mentor on a video call
description: Get the skills you need in order to get hired for your first Front-End Development job
highlights: Stop spending time on common mistakes
Focus on what is important in order to get a job, avoid the fluff
Learn best practices, do things the right way
Create projects that will make employers want to hire you

name: Website for $1k
alt: Computer screen showing a brand new site on the home page
description: Build a static website with me using your design or migrating an existing version of your website
highlights: Styled with TailwindCSS for easy maintenance
Built from your design or migrated with existing design
